tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Nice doctor, friendly nature, ** ***** ********* ** *** *********** explain all issues very well,location of her clinic is easily accessible.
She took proper measures to avoid the infections during the check up of my child.
Today I recommended this Doctor to my friend for paediatric care of his child.
Doctor explained the issue in detail and answered all the queries. Really satisfied with the interaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is very friendly and understand our concern as a parent towards the child.she explain each and every thing and respond to each query in a very positive and calm way.
